meanings.definition: Not put to use or practical application.
meanings.sent1: The unapplied knowledge remained unused in his mind.
meanings.sent2: The unapplied paint cans were stacked in the corner of the garage.
meanings.sent3: The unapplied skills of the magician surprised everyone when he performed a new trick.
meanings.sent4: Her unapplied potential was like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The unapplied ideas floated around in his head, waiting for the right moment to be implemented.

meanings.definition: Not adhering or sticking to something.
meanings.sent1: The unapplied sticker fell off the wall after a few minutes.
meanings.sent2: The unapplied glue made it easy to reposition the pieces of the puzzle.
meanings.sent3: The unapplied tape kept rolling off the table, causing a comical scene.
meanings.sent4: Her unapplied lipstick gave her a carefree and natural look.
meanings.sent5: The unapplied bandage refused to stay in place, making it difficult to protect the wound.

meanings.definition: Not assigned or designated to a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: The unapplied funds sat idly in the bank account.
meanings.sent2: The unapplied tools cluttered the workshop, waiting to be organized.
meanings.sent3: The unapplied room in the house became a makeshift storage area.
meanings.sent4: His unapplied role in the project left him feeling lost and unimportant.
meanings.sent5: The unapplied label on the box caused confusion about its contents.
